description: Expand the Old Salt Blog with 5 new features: full-text search, improved pagination/archives, newsletter signup placeholder, TinaCMS admin panel, and comments with WordPress comment migration.

requirements.search: Pagefind - static search index built at compile time
requirements.newsletter: Placeholder stub for future email integration
requirements.comments: Giscus (GitHub Discussions) with legacy WP comments displayed as static

tasks.title: Create newsletter signup placeholder
tasks.description: Create a disabled newsletter signup form as a placeholder for future email integration. Add to footer. Include RSS link as current alternative.

tasks.title: Create year archive pages
tasks.description: Create archive pages that list posts by year. Include archive index showing all years with post counts, and individual year pages with paginated posts.
acceptance: src/pages/archive/index.astro shows all years with post counts
src/pages/archive/[year].astro shows posts for that year

tasks.title: Create improved pagination component
tasks.description: Create a reusable Pagination component with page number selector, first/last links, and optional page jump input. Replace existing inline pagination.
acceptance: src/components/Pagination.astro created with props: currentPage, totalPages, baseUrl
Applied to index.astro, page/[page].astro, archive pages

tasks.title: Integrate Pagefind search
tasks.description: Add Pagefind for full-text search across all posts. Install package, update build script, create search UI component, add to header.
acceptance: package.json build script: 'astro build && npx pagefind --site dist'
Header.astro has search button that opens search modal/dropdown
pagefind.yml excludes nav, footer, pagination from index
Search works after running npm run build && npm run preview

tasks.title: Create WordPress comment migration script
tasks.description: Fetch all comments from WordPress REST API and store as JSON files. Comments will be displayed as static content above Giscus.
acceptance: Handles pagination for posts with many comments
Each comment includes: author, date, content, parent (for threading)

tasks.title: Create comments components
tasks.description: Create components to display legacy WordPress comments (static) and Giscus widget for new comments. Legacy comments shown above Giscus.
acceptance: src/components/LegacyComments.astro displays static WP comments from JSON
Comments show author, date, content with proper threading
Giscus script configured (repo, category placeholders for user to fill)
Comments section styled to match site design

tasks.title: Set up TinaCMS
tasks.description: Initialize TinaCMS with configuration matching the existing content collection schema. Enable visual editing of blog posts.
acceptance: tina/config.ts defines blog collection matching src/content.config.ts schema
Fields: title, date, slug, excerpt, author, description, featuredImage, categories, tags, body
package.json build script updated to include tinacms build
Admin UI accessible at /admin after npm run dev

tasks.title: Verify all features work
tasks.description: Run the site and verify all new features work correctly. Search returns results, archives work, comments display, TinaCMS admin loads.
acceptance: npm run dev starts without errors
Search: Build site, run preview, search finds posts
Pagination: Page numbers work, can jump to specific pages
Comments: Legacy comments display on posts (after migration)
TinaCMS: /admin loads and shows post editor
All styling consistent with existing design
